d1 $ n (run 3) # s "monosynth"

d1 $ n "d3(3,8)" # s "pc1"

d1 $ n (run 3) # s "pc0" 
d1 $ n (run 3) # s "rd1"

d1 $ n (run 3) # s "split" 
d1 $ n "0" # s "stinger"
d1 $ n (run 3) # s "zone" 
d1 $ n "0" # s "zone" # end "0.3"

d3 $ every 6 (slow 4) $ n "0 3? ~ 4?" # s "glo2" # gain 1 # orbit 0
d4 $ every 8 (#s "gen4") $ n "{0 3 {~ 4}} % 2" # s "glow" # gain 0.9 #orbit 1 # end 0.1

d6 $ sometimes (rev) $ every 2  ((# s "gvoc").(# speed 2)) $ n "{{0 3} {~ 4}} % 2" # s "hit" # gain 1 # orbit 1
d7 $ every 6 (# s "kitb monochord") $ n "0 3? {4 5}%2 " # s "hithat" # gain 1 # orbit 0

let filler p = every 3 (within (0.0, 0.50)(slow 2 . rev . stut 8 0.75 0.25)) $ every 7 (inside 3 (within (0.5, 0.75)(stut 4 0.95 0.25))) $ someCyclesBy 0.125 (within (0.75, 1.0)(trunc 0.5)) p

let realAF p = every 3 (slow 2) $ someCyclesBy 0.125 (stut 8 0.95 0.25) $ every 16 (within (0.5,0.75)(slow 4 . striate 16)) p
let (tape,tape_p) = pF "tape"(Nothing)

let slicepat :: Pattern Int -> Int -> Pattern a -> Pattern a
    slicepat pi n p = Pattern f
    -- TODO deal with span vs span'
      where f a = concatMap (\(span, span', i) -> arc (compressTo span (zoomTo i p)) span) $ arc pi a
            zoomTo :: Int -> Pattern a -> Pattern a
            zoomTo i p = zoom ((fromIntegral (i `mod` n)) / fromIntegral n,
                               (fromIntegral ((i `mod` n)+1)) / fromIntegral n
                              ) p

let modNote n f p = stack [f $ filterValues (isEq n . (Map.!?n_p)) p,filterValues (not . isEq n . (Map.!?n_p)) p] where isEq a m = (isJust m) && (a == (fromJust $ fromV $ fromJust m))
let modNotec note f p = stack [f $ filterValues (isEq note . (Map.!?note_p)) p,filterValues (not . isEq note . (Map.!?note_p)) p] where isEq a m = (isJust m) && (a == (fromJust $ fromV $ fromJust m))
let maven a b c p = stut' 4(a) (|*| coarse b ) $ stut' 4(1) (|*| speed c ) p
hush
d1 $ nToOrbit $ modNote 1 ((#speed (scale 0.8 1.2 $ saw)).(#rect 0.5).(#comb (disc 4 $ scale 0.1 0.4 $ saw *rand)) )$slow (3.5/3) $ n "{0 < ~ ~ 0 ~> <1 1 [~ 1] 1 1/2 [1 1] [~ 1 ]> 0 <1 1 1 [1 1]> ~ }%5 " #s "blp2" #shape 0.5
